content.rendered:
StarConnect Plus

StarConnect Plus™

With StarConnect Plus Online Banking, you can control your finances anytime and any place!

Manage your accounts

Not only can you view your balances and transfer funds between your Westamerica accounts, you can enroll in eStatements, order copies of cleared checks, request stop payments, order new checks, or send a secure e-mail to a Customer Service Representative.

Track Spending and Reconcile your Accounts

You can view and track your transaction history or create a report within StarConnect Plus. You can also download transactions directly into QuickBooks, Quicken, or Money to automatically reconcile your accounts.

Pay Bills

Enroll in our optional Bill Pay service and with the click of the mouse pay your bills! Send payments to just about anyone and say good-bye to postage stamps.

Earn Rewards for Everyday Purchases

With Purchase Rewards you can turn everyday purchases with your ATM/Debit card into cash back. Just log in to StarConnect Plus to see exclusive cash back offers from the types of places you like to shop. Activate the offers on StarConnect Plus, redeem them by paying with your ATM/Debit card and you’ll enjoy cash back deposited right into your account at the end of the following month.

Start Saving Time Today!

Log in, take a tour, or enroll now!
